FuncDef:
The p2mp dynamic command creates a P2MP TE tunnel of a specified type.
The undo p2mp dynamic command deletes a P2MP TE tunnel.
By default, P2MP tunnels are not created.

ParaDef.Info:
Creates an automatic P2MP TE tunnel.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
On multicast VPLS networks, P2MP TE tunnels are classified as automatic or static P2MP TE tunnels:
To configure an automatic P2MP TE tunnel, run the p2mp dynamic command.

Prerequisites
The tunnel type has been specified as P2MP TE, and the VSI-Inclusive-Root-MPLSTE view is displayed using the mpls-te command.A P2MP tunnel template has been created using the mpls te p2mp-template command before the static P2MP TE tunnels are configured.

Precautions
Static P2MP TE tunnels can reference a TE template only after the TE template is configured.
